tool_description: Get the list of all KFC locations.

api_list.name: Get by Id
api_list.description: Retrieve details of a specific KFC location by its unique identifier.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the KFC location.

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the KFC location (optional, same as required).
